p: Kindred can mark targets to Hunt. Successfully completing a Hunt permanently empowers Kindred's basic abilities. Every 4 hunts completed also increases Kindred's basic attack range.
q: Kindred tumbles and shoots up to three arrows at nearby targets.
w: Wolf enrages and attacks enemies around him.  Lamb passively gains stacks by moving and attacking. When fully charged, Lamb's next attack restores health.
e: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.
r: Lamb grants all living things inside a zone a respite from death. Until the effect ends, nothing can die. At the end, units are healed.

blurd: Separate, but never parted, Kindred represents the twin essences of death. Lamb's bow offers a swift release from the mortal realm for those who accept their fate. Wolf hunts down those who run from their end, delivering violent finality within his...
name: Kindred
title: The Eternal Hunters
